author: wsjcom
title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
Neela Montgomery took over as chief executive of Crate and Barrel in August when the company’s previous chief, Doug Diemoz, departed after less than two years on the job. A Management article on March 22 that contained an interview with Ms. Montgomery inadvertently omitted the phrase describing Mr. Diemoz’s departure.
U.S.-European Union foreign-direct investment stands at $6 trillion total. A World News article on March 21 about U.S.-EU trade incorrectly said that the bilateral FDI is $5 trillion annually.
...
